trends: There have been 12 other sightings in Appleton
There were no other sightings in Appleton on or around June 1st 2013
divs: Sighting Detailsstanding outside looking north and saw 6 or 7 bright orange objects moving towards east. they moved slow and steady in a straight line. It gave me a cold shiver when i saw it. 4 people besides me saw them. they flew into cloud cover and we lost sight.
Summary: 6 or 7 bright orange orbs movong east
